name: Environaut\Config\Config
short_desc: Default representation of the config file data.

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.short_desc: Create new instance with some default config data.

getExportImplementor.name: getExportImplementor
getExportImplementor.hint_desc: (namespaced) class name to use for exporting a report

getReportImplementor.name: getReportImplementor
getReportImplementor.hint_desc: (namespaced) class name to use for a report

getRunnerImplementor.name: getRunnerImplementor
getRunnerImplementor.hint_desc: (namespaced) class name to use for running checks read from the config

getReadOnlyCacheImplementor.name: getReadOnlyCacheImplementor
getReadOnlyCacheImplementor.hint_desc: (namespaced) class name to use for cache given to checks

getCacheImplementor.name: getCacheImplementor
getCacheImplementor.hint_desc: (namespaced) class name to use for writing cachable settings after report generation

get.name: get
get.short_desc: Returns the config value for the given key.
get.hint_desc: value for that key or default given

default.name: default
default.short_desc: value to return if key doesn't exist

has.name: has
has.short_desc: Returns whether the config key exists or not.
has.hint_desc: true, if key exists; false otherwise

key.name: key
key.short_desc: name of config key to check

set.name: set
set.short_desc: Sets a given value to the config under the specified key.

value.name: value
value.short_desc: value to set for the given key

toArray.name: toArray
toArray.short_desc: Returns the config data as an associative array.
